title: asifiqbalsumon
author: asifiqbalsumon
content: I would like to request for 200 USDT loan with a 10% interest rate payable by 1st Dec 2023Loan Amount: 200 USDTLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 220 USDTLoan Repay Date: For 10 daysType of Collateral: N/AMy USDT wallet addressTR8pUxw8gKjSqKTpLyew8vjFuXCPxDq4eZTRC20I will be very pleased if anyone wants to help me.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Sent 7e42cf34b73c89cf336b2a1f316aa7771a5ab3b7dfae26b728018500f503e68dPay me back to TR8pUxw8gKjSqKTpLyew8vjFuXCPxDq4eD, thanks.

comments.body: Quote from: asifiqbalsumon on November 21, 2023, 06:20:02 AMQuote from: Despairo on November 21, 2023, 05:43:40 AMSent 7e42cf34b73c89cf336b2a1f316aa7771a5ab3b7dfae26b728018500f503e68dPay me back to TR8pUxw8gKjSqKTpLyew8vjFuXCPxDq4eD, thanks.You have not sent me. Why will I pay you back?Think about it man. You are a new account, you come into the forum, and your 1st post is for a loan. On top of that, you offer nothing to cover the loan if something happens(collateral). Do you really think people just hand out money and pray they get repaid? It's not rocket science.

It's not rocket science.I understand and appreciate your concern. Actually I visited this website and found LOAN option. So, I asked for a loan due to requirements. Also, I don't have any other fund to keep collateral. But if you want to get any collateral you can give me perfect Money loan (credit exchange).  Credit score of my perfect money is much higher ( around $70K transaction completed)

comments.author: fenican
comments.body: Proof of payment checks out. If you didn't receive the funds chances are your wallet is misconfigured. That's not Despairo's fault.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: @asifiqbalsumon, I will advise that you should use your original account to apply for the loan, and you might get a chance of your loan request being accepted. It is quite strange that you just created your account yesterday and are asking for a loan same day. The question is, how did you even find the lending board, or if you were asked by your friends to come on the forum and request a loan, were you not told by your friends that brand new and newbies don't stand a chance of getting a loan from the forum? You should use your original account to request the loan if you are actually serious.
